title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu on May Jobs, Slowing Recovery
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu on May Jobs, Slowing Recovery
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Lu Senior Fellow University of Virginia Miller Center Former Deputy Secretary of Labor US Department of Labor Discussing a breakdown of May employment report with Steve Blitz Chief U.S. Economist at TS Lombard.
